entry.title: Apple services enrich peoples’ lives throughout the year
entry.content: Apple’s services helped deliver innovative apps, powerful content, and experiences that enrich users’ lives in more ways than ever before.

link.title: Apple services enrich peoples’ lives throughout the year

entry.title: Apple Fitness+ introduces Collections and Time to Run starting January 10
entry.content: Apple Fitness+, the first fitness and wellness service built entirely around Apple Watch, is introducing Collections and Time to Run on January 10.

link.title: Apple Fitness+ introduces Collections and Time to Run starting January 10

entry.title: Apple marks a year of giving in the communities it calls home
entry.content: Apple’s employee donation and volunteering program raises nearly $725 million over the last decade.

link.title: Apple marks a year of giving in the communities it calls home

entry.title: Apple, Boys & Girls Clubs team up to offer coding opportunities to kids, teens
entry.content: In celebration of Computer Science Education Week, Apple and Boys & Girls Clubs of America launched a new program for young learners.

link.title: Apple, Boys & Girls Clubs team up to offer coding opportunities to kids, teens

entry.title: Apple Fitness+ will feature Prince William on Time to Walk starting December 6
entry.content: Prince William will be the next Time to Walk guest on Apple Fitness+, closing the second season with an episode that will be released December 6.

link.title: Apple Fitness+ will feature Prince William on Time to Walk starting December 6

entry.title: App Store Awards honor the best apps and games of 2021
entry.content: The 2021 App Store Awards recognize 15 apps and games that offer powerful experiences across Apple devices.

link.title: App Store Awards honor the best apps and games of 2021

entry.title: Apple Rosenthaler Straße opens Thursday, December 2, in Berlin
entry.content: Apple showcases the creativity and diversity of Berlin with special Today at Apple programming by local illustrators.

link.title: Apple Rosenthaler Straße opens Thursday, December 2, in Berlin

entry.title: Community caregivers spread hope in Ghana, with support from Apple
entry.content: Apple marks 15 years of partnership through its (PRODUCT)RED campaign to support the Global Fund’s efforts to stop the spread of AIDS across Africa.

link.title: Community caregivers spread hope in Ghana, with support from Apple

entry.title: 15 years fighting AIDS with (RED): Apple helps raise nearly $270 million
entry.content: Over the past 15 years, Apple customers have played a critical role in (RED)’s fight to end AIDS through support to the Global Fund.

link.title: 15 years fighting AIDS with RED: Apple helps raise nearly $270 million

entry.title: Apple Podcasts presents the Best of 2021
entry.content: Apple celebrates this year’s best and most popular podcasts and their creators.

link.title: Apple Podcasts presents the Best of 2021

entry.title: Apple announces third annual Apple Music Award winners
entry.content: Apple today announced the winners of the third annual Apple Music Awards, recognizing the best artists of 2021 and their influence on global culture.

link.title: Apple announces third annual Apple Music Award winners

entry.title: Apple sues NSO Group to curb the abuse of state-sponsored spyware
entry.content: Apple today filed a lawsuit against NSO Group to hold it accountable for abusive surveillance and the targeting of a small number of Apple users.

link.title: Apple sues NSO Group to curb the abuse of state-sponsored spyware

entry.title: The reimagined Apple The Grove now open in Los Angeles
entry.content: The entirely new Apple The Grove opened this Friday, November 19, at the popular shopping destination in Los Angeles.

link.title: The reimagined Apple The Grove now open in Los Angeles

entry.title: SharePlay powers new ways to stay connected and share experiences in FaceTime
entry.content: SharePlay, a powerful set of features for shared experiences while on FaceTime, has introduced new ways for Apple users to stay connected.

link.title: SharePlay powers new ways to stay connected and share experiences in FaceTime

entry.title: Today at Apple Creative Studios celebrates artists from D.C., LA, and Chicago
entry.content: Through hands-on experience, participants used their learnings to create and present final projects to friends, family, and local communities.

link.title: Today at Apple Creative Studios celebrates artists from D.C., LA, and Chicago

entry.title: Apple announces Self Service Repair
entry.content: Apple parts, tools, and manuals — starting with iPhone 12 and iPhone 13 — available to individual consumers.

link.title: Apple announces Self Service Repair

entry.title: “Disney Melee Mania” coming this December exclusively on Apple Arcade
entry.content: Apple today announced “Disney Melee Mania” will join its popular gaming subscription service, Apple Arcade.

link.title: “Disney Melee Mania” coming this December exclusively on Apple Arcade

entry.title: Apple honors and celebrates American veterans
entry.content: On Veterans Day and throughout the year, Apple recognizes those who serve and their families for their courage, dedication, and sacrifices.

link.title: Apple honors and celebrates American veterans

entry.title: Veterans use Apple technology to revolutionize trauma medicine
entry.content: With the aid of a new app, T6, designed for iPad, veterans are drawing from a lifetime of service to revolutionize trauma medicine.

link.title: Veterans use Apple technology to revolutionize trauma medicine

entry.title: Apple introduces Apple Business Essentials
entry.content: Apple Business Essentials brings device management, Apple Support, and iCloud storage into flexible subscription plans for small businesses.

link.title: Apple introduces Apple Business Essentials
